comments.body:
It looks like this has a python entry point. You should add it:

https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/resources/define-metadata.html#python-entry-points

and then add a test under `commands`:

https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/resources/define-metadata.html#test-commands

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  entry_points:
    - pushover = pushover:main
